    Package Description

    • Uses of IDispatcher in model

      Fields in model declared as IDispatcher 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private IDispatcher<IBallCmd> BallModel.myDispatcher
      myDispatcher is the instance of the dispatcher.
      Methods in model with parameters of type IDispatcher 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IBallCmd.apply(Ball context, IDispatcher<IBallCmd> disp)
      The method is run by the ball's update() method, which is called when the ball is updated by the dispatcher.
      void MultiInteractStrategy.interact(Ball context, Ball target, IDispatcher<IBallCmd> disp) 
      void IInteractStrategy.interact(Ball context, Ball target, IDispatcher<IBallCmd> disp)
      Performs a directed interaction between the context ball and the target Ball from the perspective of the context Ball.
      void Ball.interactWith(Ball another, IDispatcher<IBallCmd> disp)
      Perform interaction with another Ball.
      void Ball.update(IDispatcher<IBallCmd> o, IBallCmd cmd)
      This method is called by the ballModel Dispatcher to notify all the balls to perform the given command.
      void IUpdateStrategy.updateState(Ball context, IDispatcher<TDispMsg> dispatcher)
      Abstract method to update the state of a ball.
      void Ball.updateState(IDispatcher<IBallCmd> dispatcher)
      Update the ball's state using updateStrategy.

      class  ACollectionDispatcher<TDispMsg>
      An abstract Collection-based IDispatcher.

      A Collection-based Dispatcher that uses a CopyOnWriteArraySet.
